abstract: Congress should be debating laws governing the use of force, not symbolic resolutions.
lead_paragraph: The most consequential decision a member of Congress can make is whether to send troops into harm’s way, and it is one we take seriously and personally. We both served in the greater Middle East and saw the impact of these intractable conflicts on our fellow service members and their families. Our military personnel are our nation’s most valuable asset; we must not send them into unnecessary war.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
